best.details:
lighting /'laitiη/  

Đọc giọng UK Đọc giọng US
Danh từ
hệ thống chiếu sáng
street lighting
hệ thống chiếu sáng đường phố
ánh sáng

lighting /ˈlaɪtɪŋ/  

Đọc giọng UK Đọc giọng US
noun
[noncount] light that is of a particular kind or that has a particular quality
He prefers natural lighting for his photography.
artificial lighting
The lighting wasn't bright enough.
The street lighting was so dim I got lost.
the equipment used to provide light
There was a problem with the lighting.
a company that sells lighting equipment
the use of light for a particular purpose in a movie, play, etc.
He's in charge of the lighting for the show.
